div.div: Σθένελος : Sthenelus.—(1) son of Capaneus, and one of the Epigoni (‘Descendants’) who took Thebes, companion of Diomed, Il. 2.564, Il. 4.367 ff., Il. 23.511, Il. 9.48.—(2) son of Perseus and Andromeda, father of Eurystheus, Il. 19.116, 123.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
